HPI 8825 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1995 Hi-Land GT Sendai 2nd Place M. Kageyama/K. Hoshino

Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8825/8825.html

No, you're not seeing double. This is another of the special Ebbro x HPI collaboration Skyline models of the #1 Calsonic car. This one being from round 3: Hi-Land GT Sendai. Masahiko Kageyama and Kazuyoshi Hoshino drove to a 2nd place finish in this race. You can see it in action near the start of the 1995 JGTC Review round 3 coverage.

There are actually a lot of differences between these 2 cars so kudo to Ebbro/HPI for the extra effort on these (and the other 6 Skylines). How many differences can you spot? I have no idea how many there are but I do plan a side by side comparison of the different models once I get them all photographed.







Sources:
Hi-Land GT Sendai 1995 - Race Results - Racing Sports Cars
